title: Relates to providing state aid for transportation of students to and from extracurricular activities
summary: Provides that fifty percent of the cost of transportation of students to and from extracurricular activities shall be included in regular aidable transportation; provides that a school district shall only receive fifty percent of the cost of such transportation.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to expenses for transportation of students to and from extracurricular activities
